com.github.arachnidium.core.settings

Class ScreenShots

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.arachnidium.util.configuration.AbstractConfigurationAccessHelper
      • com.github.arachnidium.core.settings.ScreenShots

  • public class ScreenShots
extends AbstractConfigurationAccessHelper
    Stores these flags:
    - to take screenshots when element is highlighted
    - to take screenshots when new browser WebDriver.Window or context (see ContextAware)
    is found

    Specification:


    ...
    "screenShots":
    {
      "toTakeScreenShotsOnElementHighLighting":{
        "type":"BOOL",
        "value":"flag value"
      },
      "toTakeScreenShotsOfNewHandles":{
        "type":"BOOL",
        "value":"flag value"
      }
    }
    ...

    See Also:
    Configuration
